definition: a defense by an accused person purporting to show that they could not have committed the crime in question, to exonerate by means of an alibi
details:
noun
- a defense by an accused person purporting to show that they could not have committed the crime in question
= example: a defense by an accused person purporting to show that they could not have committed the crime in question
- a defense of some offensive behavior or some failure to keep a promise etc.
= synonyms: exculpation
verb
- to exonerate by means of an alibi
= example: to exonerate by means of an alibi
